text:
Personnel attached to the All Women Police Station, Ambur are on the lookout for a 20-year-old youth for sexually assaulting a seven-year-old child in his house in Madhanur.

Police said the youth stayed a few houses away from the girl’s house.

He had taken her to his house when she was playing outside and sexually assaulted her on March 5.

Following this, the girl’s parents had taken her to a hospital, which in turn informed the police.

Police have booked a case under sections 3 and 4 of Protection of Children from Sexual Offences. Police said the youth is absconding, and they have launched an extensive search for him. - Staff Reporter
title: Police on the lookout for youth
